description: This Java class defines a User entity for a notes application backend, including fields for user identification, authentication, creation timestamp, and notes owned by the user. It also specifies database mapping annotations for ORM via Jakarta Persistence (JPA).

classes.name: User
classes.description: Entity class representing a user in the notes application, with fields for username, password hash, creation timestamp, and associated notes.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier of the user.

methods.name: getUsername
methods.description: Returns the username of the user.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Returns the creation timestamp of the user account.

methods.name: getNotes
methods.description: Returns the set of notes associated with the user.

methods.name: setUsername
methods.description: Sets the username for the user.

methods.name: setPasswordHash
methods.description: Sets the password hash for the user.
